entities.name: Problem

entities.name: Decision
entities.description: Decision made during conversation (e.g., 'use FastAPI', 'avoid threads')

extraction_strategy.description: Cognee's LLM-powered extraction during cognify() automatically identifies entities and relationships from conversation text without manual annotation
benefits: No manual entity tagging required from users
Adaptive to different conversation styles and topics
Leverages LLM understanding of natural language

retrieval_benefits.multi_path_traversal: Graph enables finding related content through multiple relationship paths (e.g., Question → HAS_TOPIC → Topic → RELATED_TO → Topic → HAS_TOPIC → Past Question)
retrieval_benefits.semantic_plus_structural: Hybrid GRAPH_COMPLETION combines vector similarity (semantic matching) with graph relationships (structural connections) for higher quality context retrieval
retrieval_benefits.conversation_continuity: FOLLOWS_UP relationships help identify conversation threads and related discussions
retrieval_benefits.concept_dependencies: PREREQUISITE_FOR relationships surface foundational concepts needed to understand current topic
retrieval_benefits.problem_solution_matching: Direct SOLVES relationships enable finding past solutions to similar problems
retrieval_benefits.topic_clustering: RELATED_TO relationships group conversations by subject area for better context organization
retrieval_benefits.decision_tracking: IMPACTS relationships link decisions to affected topics for context-aware recommendations

metrics_to_track: Entity counts per type (User, Question, Answer, Topic, Concept, Problem, Solution, Decision)
Relationship counts per type (ASKS, HAS_TOPIC, MENTIONS, etc.)
Concept reuse (concepts mentioned across multiple conversations)
